title: Pathetic experience with Uber Shuttle in Delhi NCR
selftext:
Pathetic Service delivered through shuttle service in Delhi NCR region!!!

Uber is allowing Shuttle Drivers to regularly deviate from route, not pick up users so that they can earn more money!! And this is after buying their monthly pass!!
comments: Customer service focuses on copy and paste response!!
